name: Bobsled
overview: You're the driver of an Olympic bobsled racing down a mountain. Watch out for boulders, obstacles and DON'T HIT THE CHALET! Steer quickly as you gather speed going down the slope. Can you remain in control and reach the finish line? It's the countdown and your hands are tense against the control arm. An Olympic gold medal is in your grasp as you get ready for the challenge of your life. Quick reflexes and constant observation keep you in control on your journey. Swoooosh!
